QAPair.Question: What is (are) Ankle fracture - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: An ankle fracture is a break in 1 or more ankle bones. These fractures may: Be partial (the bone is only partially cracked, not all the way through), Be complete (the bone is broken through and is in 2 parts), Occur on one or both sides of the ankle , Occur where the ligament was injured or torn,
